title: Comparative assessment of two circularity indicators for the case of reusable versus single-use secondary packages for fresh foods in Spain
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Ilija Sazdovski, Laura Batlle-Bayer, Alba Bala, Maria Margallo, Sahar Azarkamand, Ruben Aldaco, Pere Fullana-i-Palmer
